tips.title: Plan Your Day Wisely
tips.info: Every time segment counts! Prioritize activities to maximize your character’s growth and opportunities.

tips.title: Invest in Yourself
tips.info: Boost your stats by working out, studying, and socializing. A stronger, smarter, and more charming character unlocks better jobs and opportunities.

tips.title: Respect is Key
tips.info: Building respect opens doors to powerful allies and exclusive opportunities. Treat your relationships with NPCs carefully!

tips.title: Diversify Your Income
tips.info: Don’t rely on just one source of money. Explore jobs, hustling, and investments to increase your wealth.

tips.title: Stay Out of Trouble
tips.info: Avoid getting caught in illegal activities. A criminal record can set you back significantly!

tips.title: Unlock New Areas
tips.info: As you progress, explore new districts. They offer better jobs, more lucrative opportunities, and influential NPCs.

tips.title: Manage Your Money Wisely
tips.info: Spend on essentials like food and shelter, but also invest in luxuries that boost Charm or Intelligence.

tips.title: Gambling Can Be Risky
tips.info: High Charm improves your chances in negotiation-based games, but always weigh the risks before betting big.

tips.title: Build Alliances
tips.info: Powerful allies offer protection and help you gain respect. Focus on building relationships with key NPCs.

tips.title: Adapt to the City’s Changes
tips.info: The economy and city conditions change daily. Stay flexible and adjust your strategy accordingly!
